attributes.action: GIVE A PERCENTAGE OF LOTTERY MONEY TO NHS
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Why should camelot bosses be allowed to make billions of pounds each year.
Why not give a percentage of each years profits to the nhs.
At least then people who play the lottery know its going to a good cause in the end.
Instead of lining the pockets of the seriously overpaid already

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
